ygData.subject: Re: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahhhh, I never realized that. My agnostic magician has one. I always wondered why the guards in Netikulos still attacked my Paladin friend but not me. I just
ygData.messageBody:
Ahhhh, I never realized that. My agnostic magician has one. I always
wondered why the guards in Netikulos still attacked my Paladin friend but
not me. I just assumed it was because Paladins are so snooty ;-) Thanks for
the info.

Dank

> From: jhenders@...
>
> On Tue, Nov 23/99, Kyle Q <kyleq@...> wrote:
> > From: "Kyle Q" <kyleq@...>
> >
> > Umm, it grants ultravision and protection from turds like Bouncer Hurd.
Why
> > _wouldn't_ anyone want this? Bards and rogues just get the extra bonus
of
> > being able to wear it.
>
> Unless you are agnostic it doesn't help at all in being KOS to evil
> races. NPC's can magically determine your religion somehow, so even if
> you look like a DE, they'll kill you for worshipping Karana, Quellious
> or whoever.
>
> --
> Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
> GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++ u++ t- m--- W--- !v
> b+++ e* s-/+ n-(?) h++ f+g+ w+++ y*
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
